history.text: Hey there. This movie is called the Blind Side! And I think it is a great movie and think that you should most definitely see this movie!
What genre is the Blind Side?
It is an American biographical sports drama film that is written and directed by john Lee Hancock and it is based ont eh 2006 book, "The blind Side: Evolution of a Game" by Michael Lewis
i
I am a fan of biographically movies. What sport does this movie focus on?
The Genre is Biographical, Sports, Drama
It focuses on an offensive lineman who was drafted by the Baltimore Raves of the NFL
What year does this movie take place in?
It follows him from his impoverished upbringing, through his years at Wingate Christian School (a fictional representation of Briarcrest Christian school in Memphis, Tennessee)
It is 2009
Do you think I would need to be a fan of sports to enjoy this movie?
It received a cinematic score of A+
Do you know if the movie has received any awards?

No I dont believe that you would need to be a fa of sports in order to enjoy this movie. It talks about his upbringing and his adoption to his position as one of the most highly coveted prospects in college football.
fan*
It seems to be very interesting.

It states that the movie may strike some viewers as a little too 
pat, but the Blind Side has the benefit of strong source material and a strong performance by Sandra Bullock.
It is about Michael Oher
well rather his story
Do you know any other famous actors who are in this movie?

Besides Bullock, some of the key players were:
Quinton Aaron as Michael Oher
Tim McGraw as Sean Tuohy
Jae Head as Sean "S.J: Tuohy Jr
Lily Collins as Collins Tuohy

Some key scenes in the movie were when Leigh Anne's friends wonder what she is doing they suggest that Collins might not be safe around Michael, but Leigh Anne rebukes them. She later asks Collins how she feels about it. Collins replied that they cannot just throw Micha
el out.

She learned that he was taken from his drug-addicted mother when he was seven and that no one knows her whereabouts. She is also told that although he scored poorly in career aptitude tests, he was ranked in the 98th percentile in "protective instincts".
So you think it would be worth a watch for you?
Do*
I am definitely interested in watching this movie.
Do you feel like the relationship between Leigh and Michael is an important part of the story?
I believe that you will enjoy it based on the information I have available!
I hope so, but I am still curious about the question I previously mentioned.

From the readings it appears that Leigh Anne is strong-minded and took on the responsibi
lity expertly
Is Leigh Anne a love interest to Michael?
No, LeAnne is an interior designer and the wife of a wealthy busniessman
So she acts more as a mentor to him?
Yes.
It was her son that brought Michael to the attention of his parents
The sons name is Sean jr. )S.J)
Thank you for clarifying. Is there a major love interest for Michael in the movie?
At some point during an interview Michael ran away and confronted Leigh Anne about her motives for taking him in
Very interesting.

He then proceeded to go about finding his biological mother in Hurt Village. There a gang leader welcomed Michael back and offered him a beer and makes some sexually offensive insinuations about Leigh Anne and Collins. When the gang leader threatens to go after them, michael battles with him and other thugs.
Thank you for taking the time to explain the movie to me. I am definitely interested in watching it.

After thinking things over and questioning Leigh Anne, Michael tells Granger, that he chose Ole Miss because , "Its where my family goes to school." Michael is accepted into college and says his farewells to the Touhy family
No worries! Thank you for listening!
Have a great evening

uid1response.feedback: The movie was explained relatively well to me, and despite not being a fan of sports, I am interested in biographical films. The other user explained parts of the plot to me, and I am very interested.
